sense.def:
To have responsibility for something
pomeni, da je človek dolžan skrbeti za nekaj in sprejemati odločitve v zvezi s tistim. Rečemo tudi, da je nekaj takega
one's responsibility
.

seg.quote: She took over the responsibility for the project.

sense.def:
To accept responsibility for something
pomeni, da se strinjamo, da smo mi krivi za nekaj, kar se je zgodilo.

seg.quote: I made a mistake and I will assume responsibility for it.

sense.def:
One's responsibilities
so dolžnosti, ki jih imamo zaradi službe ali svojega položaja.

To have a responsibility to someone
pomeni imeti dolžnost, da nekomu pomagamo ali skrbimo zanj.

seg.quote: I presume you take your responsibility to your students seriously?
